titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1) to provide for the implementation of the recommendations of the National Commission on Terrorist Attacks Upon the United States.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 1) to provide for the implementation of the recommendations of the National Commission on Terrorist Attacks Upon the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-260, by Mr. Hastings (FL).
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 91.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 567.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report on H.R. 1 (Implementing Recommendations of the 9/11 Commission Act of 2007).
